name: Sweet Potato
properties: Lower glycemic load than white potatoes
benefits: Preferable to white potatoes based on glycemic load. Highly satiating while providing important nutrients. Helps with appetite control and weight management.

quotes: If you want to go underground, on the basis of what we learned about glycemic load, sweet potatoes would be preferable to white.
2 cups/270g diced sweet potato or de-seeded butternut squash
